title: Data Science- Regression Table - Info

metadata.description: Learn about Data Science- Regression Table - Info with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
The "Information Part" in Regression Table
Dep. Variable:
is short for "Dependent Variable". Calorie_Burnage is 
  here the dependent variable. The Dependent variable is here assumed to be explained by Average_Pulse.
Model:
OLS is short for Ordinary Least Squares. This is a type of model that uses the Least Square method.
Date:
and
Time:
shows the date and time the output was calculated in Python.

★
+1

quiz.explanation: The correct definition of Burnage is 'here the dependent variable'.
